Description: Dropper (scent), qumqum. Made of beaten and silver inlaid brass.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2014 30 Mar - 29 Jun, Dallas Museum of Art, 'Nur: Light in Art and Science from the Islamic World' 2013-14 24 Oct - 9 Feb, Seville, Focus-Abengoa Foundation, 'Nur' 2007 26 Mar-8 Jul, USA, New York, Metropolitan Museum of Art, Moments of Vision - Venice and the Islamic World 2006 2 Oct-2007 18 Feb, France, Paris, Institut de Monde Arabe, Moments of Vision - Venice and the Islamic World
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
